svg.style: font-family: 'Helvetica Neue', Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 18px; background-color: white; text-rendering: optimizeLegibility; -webkit-font-smoothing: antialiased;

text.tspan: Hidden Hunger Index vs. extreme poverty, 2009
The Hidden Hunger Index in pre-school children (HHI-PD), which provides an index of three nutritional deficiency
estimates (stunting, anemia related to iron deficiency and vitamin-A deficiency) in 2009 versus the share of the
population living in extreme poverty (living on less than $1.90 a day at 2011 international prices).
Share of population living in extreme poverty
Hidden Hunger Index in preschool children
Source: World Bank – WDI, Hidden Hunger Index in pre-school children - Muthayya et al. (2013)
